Here are some more genius ideas for a gunsmith:

1. Custom grip panels: Offer custom-made grip panels for popular firearms like the 1911, Sig Sauer, and Glock. Customers can choose from a variety of materials such as wood, G10, carbon fiber, and aluminum.
2. Gun coatings: Offer custom coatings for firearms using durable coatings such as Cerakote, Duracoat, or GunKote. Customers can choose from a variety of colors and patterns, such as camo, multicam, or urban gray.
3. Barrel threading: Offer barrel threading services for customers who want to add a suppressor to their firearms. This can include threading for popular calibers such as 5.56, .308, and 9mm.
4. Trigger work: Offer trigger work services for popular firearms like the AR-15, AK-47, and Remington 700. This can include polishing, adjusting, and upgrading the trigger components to improve accuracy and reliability.
5. Gunsmith training: Offer gunsmith training courses for aspiring gunsmiths. This can include courses on basic gunsmithing skills, firearm repair, and custom gun building.
6. Gun rentals: Offer gun rental services for customers who want to try out different firearms before they purchase. This can include popular firearms like the AR-15, AK-47, and Glock.
7. Firearm safety courses: Offer firearm safety courses for new gun owners or customers who want to improve their shooting skills. This can include courses on basic firearm safety, marksmanship, and self-defense.
8. Gun engraving: Offer gun engraving services for customers who want to personalize their firearms. This can include engraving custom designs or text on popular firearms like the 1911 or AR-15.
9. Gun parts manufacturing: Offer custom gun parts manufacturing services for customers who need hard-to-find or discontinued gun parts. This can include parts for popular firearms like the 1911, AK-47, and Remington 700.
10. Custom firearm builds: Offer custom firearm building services for customers who want a truly unique firearm. This can include building custom firearms from scratch, using parts from different firearms to create a unique hybrid, or modifying existing firearms to create a one-of-a-kind firearm.
